name: igris-core
description: The core of the Igris framework

scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run type-check
scripts.release:patch: echo 'Starting patch release process' && npm version patch && npm publish && git add package.json && echo 'Release process completed'
scripts.release:minor: echo 'Starting minor release process' && npm version minor && npm publish && git add package.json && echo 'Release process completed'
scripts.release:major: echo 'Starting minor release process' && npm version major && npm publish && git add package.json && echo 'Release process completed'

author: Mariano Fernandez
